effect_entries.effect:
Held by []{pokemon:happiny}
:   Holder evolves into []{pokemon:chansey} when it levels up during the daytime.
effect_entries.short_effect: Level-up during Day on a Happiny: Holder evolves into Chansey.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ある　特定の　ポケモンを
進化させる　不思議な　石。
たまのように　まるい。

A peculiar stone that can make
certain species of Pokémon evolve.
It’s as round as a Pokémon Egg.

Pietra particolare che fa evolvere determinate
specie di Pokémon. È a forma di uovo.

Una piedra peculiar que hace evolucionar a
algunos Pokémon. Tiene forma de huevo.

Dieser besondere, eiförmige Stein hilft
manchen Pokémon bei ihrer Evolution.

Une pierre étrange qui fait évoluer certaines
espèces de Pokémon. Elle a la forme d’un œuf.

어느 특정 포켓몬을
진화시키는 이상한 돌.
구슬처럼 둥글다.

ある　とくていの　ポケモンを
しんかさせる　ふしぎな　いし。
たまのように　まるい。

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is shaped like an egg.

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is shaped like an egg.

Pierre étrange qui fait évoluer
certaines espèces de Pokémon.
Elle a la forme d’un œuf.

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is shaped like an egg.

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is shaped like an egg.

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is shaped like an egg.
